name: jqx.jqxRadioButton
description: With the jqxRadioButton, users make a choice among a set of mutually exclusive, related options. Users can choose one and only one option.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Sets whether the radio button is disabled.

properties.name: checked
properties.description: Sets whether the radio button is checked.

properties.name: groupName
properties.description: Sets the group name. When this property is set, checking a radio button from the group, will uncheck only the radio buttons from the same group.

properties.name: uip-visible
properties.description: Sets whether the widget is visible.

properties.name: uip-selectable
properties.description: Sets whether the widget is selectable.
